titleStmt.title: Order for payment July 23, 254 cm
titleStmt.author: Petosiris, construction overseer, 18 in Pap.Lugd.Bat. XXI, p. 403

msContents.summary: Petosiris asks Zenon to pay brickmakers; unusually the upper version is a concise summary of the lower one

msItemStruct.note: Written along the fibers with 18 lines; back blank
In duplicate form: the lower version was folded from the bottom upwards and sealed

provenance.p: Purchased by Columbia University from M. Nahman and New York dealer J. Brummer, through H.I. Bell, November 1925; no. 13 (original no. 27) in Bell's inventory

div.ab:
[Outer Text] Payni 1. Give to Nechtheneibis 30 dr. for 20,000 [bricks,] to Harmachis 15 dr. for 10,000 ["] to Paapis 15 dr. for 10,000 ["] to Teos 15 dr. for 10,000 ["] to Phabis 15 dr. for 10,000 ["] total, 60,000 ["] Year 32, Payni 1.
[Inner Text] Petosiris to Zenon, greeting. Give to Nechtheneibis, brickmaker, for 20,000 bricks, 30 dr. and to Harmachis, for 10,000 ["] 15 dr. and to Paapis, or 10,000 ["] 15 dr. and to Teos, for 10,000 ["] 15 dr. and to Phabis, for 10,000 ["] 15 dr. Surety, Psenos. Good-bye. Year 32, Payni 1.
